item.title: Building a Hidden Website with Python and Tor
item.description: In this post, I will walk through how you can create and host a simple website using Python and serve it as a Tor hidden service — nothing shady, just pure geeky fun. Let’s begin by installing Tor. If you’re already familiar with the Tor browser, feel free to proceed. But if you’re new to it, you can learn more about the service here.
